hostname_invalid:
Invalid hostname
(valid characters are a-z, 0-9 and -)
sure_want_to_change_timezone: Are you sure you want to change the server time zone?
sure_want_to_change_hostname: Are you sure you want to change the server hostname?
sure_want_to_change_device_password: Are you sure you want to change the server password?
timezone_changed: The server time zone was successfully changed.
hostname_changed: The server hostname was successfully changed.
device_password_changed: The server password was successfully changed.
will_change_url: Note that this website will get a new URL with the new hostname.
